code: var szRoad = {    success: true,    errorCode: 0,    errorMsg: "成功",    data: [	{ROAD_LINE:"118.541246,24.752119;118.541641,24.751873;118.534644,24.745163;118.538012,24.742398;118.53724,24.741577"},        ]};var busLines = [];var data = szRoad.data;var hStep = 300 / (data.length - 1);var i = 0;for (var x in data) {    // i++;    // if(i<5000)    //     continue;    var line = data[x];    // if(busLines.length>500)    //     break;    var pointString = line.ROAD_LINE;    var pointArr = pointString.split(';');    var lnglats = [];    for (var j in pointArr) {        lnglats.push(pointArr[j].split(','))    }    busLines.push({        coords: lnglats,        lineStyle: {            normal: {                color: echarts.color.modifyHSL('#5A94DF', Math.round(hStep * x))            }        }    })}option = {    bmap: {        center: [118.536255,24.740859],        zoom: 15,        roam: true,        mapStyle: {            'styleJson': [{                'featureType':
